onboarding.welcomeMessage: Practice a language. Or practice another language in exchange for your language.
onboarding.fillInAllFields: Fill in all fields to create your account.
onboarding.firstNameDescription: Your first name will be visible to other Chatati's
onboarding.lastNameDescription: Only the first letter of your last name will be visible to other Chatati's
onboarding.emailDescription: Other Chatati's do NOT see your email address. This information is only shared when matched.
onboarding.welcomeBackMessage: We're glad to see you again! Please sign in to continue practicing languages.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number.
validation.firstNameInvalid: Please provide a valid first name.
validation.lastNameInvalid: Please provide a valid last name.
